title: Near Death Experiences - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/17/18
itunes:title: Near Death Experiences - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/17/18
description:
George Noory and biologist Rupert Sheldrake explore his research into near death experiences, and debate whether spirituality is connected with human consciousness and can survive death of the physical body.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
